Search results

scale-range

Scales a given input value within the specified input range to a corresponding value in the specified output range using the formula: (out-max - out-min) (x - in-min) f (x) = -------------------------------- + out-min in-max - in-min

File: overtone/algo/scaling.clj Line: 29 

      (defn scale-range
  "Scales a given input value within the specified input range to a
  corresponding value in the specified output range using the formula:

           (out-max - out-min) (x - in-min)
   f (x) = --------------------------------  + out-min
                    in-max - in-min

"

  [x in-min in-max out-min out-max]
  (+ (/ (* (- out-max out-min) (- x in-min))
        (- in-max in-min))
     out-min))
